hero.title: We're trying to make the Internet a little different.
hero.subtitle: ðŸ˜Ž We also have a very cool slogan: 'deadline for the faggots.'

bokkr.title: bokkr
bokkr.subtitle: E-books and comics of a new level.
bokkr.description: bokkr is a service for interactive books and comics. It is a fully experimental service that is still under development. We don't know what we will do, how we will do it, but we really hope for your ideas! We will turn any idea you have into reality!

pigeon.title: pigeon messenger
pigeon.subtitle: Pigeon Messenger is a messenger to rule them all
pigeon.description: pigeon messenger is also quite an experimental project. In this project we want to connect all the well-known messengers and social networks into one. We want to connect them, not something else. We hope that we can do something...

unicorn.title: Unicorn Social
unicorn.subtitle: Social network driven by community. Literally.
unicorn.description: Unicorn Social is a social network that its users 'develop'. It is likely to be available soon. How does it work? Every 4 days, the developers of the service choose three ideas from the users, and they do it! And yes, even you can leave your idea behind, and perhaps it will become a reality! P.S. We execute absolutely any ideas, no matter what they would be.

promo.title: Register to get access to:
promo.bokkr: bokkr - experimental site only for approved comics, books and so on. A lot of experiments and a lot of unforgetable adventures!
promo.pigeon: Pigeon Messenger - is a messenger to rule them all! Now you needen't to switch between different web-messengers. Now all your chats will be in one place, without any switching!

apps.title: user apps
apps.description: Huge number of other applications created by other people! They can be quite interesting, but also there can be a lot of them!

loginPage.userAgreement: By continuing, you agreeing to the User Agreement.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.subtitle: Requested content could not be found. You should double-check that the data is spelled correctly.
